spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout distortion observed. The entire right-side stairwell is missing and replaced with a hallway/open area. The balcony wall logic is flipped. Doorway orientations for the bedroom and bathroom are inconsistent with the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model lacks the staircase room entirely (E1). Significant structural reinterpretation in the bathroom area where walls are curved or missing. Background and floating constraints are met.

furniture_mapping.notes: The kitchen island and dining table are placed reasonably well. However, the bed is oddly shaped (hexagonal), and the living room sofa configuration is simplified/modified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The aesthetic perfectly matches constraints: low-poly, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and neutral background.

detected_errors.description: Entire staircase zone on the right side of the plan is missing in the 3D render.
Bathroom and bedroom door placements and wall configurations are distorted.
Hallucinated hexagonal bed and curved wall segments not present in the original 2D plan.
